title: Rajesh Hamal filmography
text: <a href="Rajesh%20Hamal">Rajesh Hamal</a> is a <a href="Nepal">Nepal</a>i film <a href="actor">actor</a>, <a href="Singing">singer</a>, <a href="Model%20%28person%29">model</a>, and <a href="television%20presenter">television presenter</a>. Hamal used to be one of the highest paid actors in Nepali film throughout the 1990s and 2000s. Hamal debuted as an actor in <a href="Deepak%20Rayamajhi">Deepak Rayamajhi</a>'s film "<a href="Yug%20Dekhi%20Yug%20Samma">Yug Dekhi Yug Samma</a>" in 1988. Since then, he has appeared in over 300 Films in a career spanning nearly four decades. He starred in "Yug Dekhi Yug Samma" (1988), <a href="Kasam%20%281992%20film%29">"Kasam"</a> (1992), "<a href="Deuta">Deuta</a>" (1991), "<a href="Ek%20Number%20Ko%20Pakhe">Ek Number Ko Pakhe</a>" (1999), "<a href="Hami%20Tin%20Bhai">Hami Tin Bhai</a>" (2004), "<a href="Ajambari%20Naataa">Ajambari Naataa</a>" (2005) and "<a href="Mukhauta">Mukhauta</a>" (2014), among others. He hosts the Nepali version of "<a href="Who%20Wants%20to%20Be%20a%20Millionaire%3F">Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?</a>", titled "<a href="Ko%20Bancha%20Crorepati">Ko Bancha Crorepati</a>" (2019).
